main.name: Deepali Musale
main.description: I want to make things, that make a difference!
main.bio: Hello!! I am an innovative and enthusiastic web designer and developer with a passion to bring ideas into reality. My experience (+2 years) includes working with diverse clients to design, build and maintain their websites. Additionally, I have helped businesses improve their social media presence and optimize their search engine appearances. I am seeking a challenging role to apply my skills, continuously learn and evolve in the digital marketing space.
main.contact message: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Deepali has a very solid knowledge base in web development, but more importantly, she knows how to use that knowledge to resolve problems and design solutions. She fit well in her team and has an even temperament that makes her easy to work with.Deepali will always do well anywhere she goes. She is one of the brightest people that I've had he ability to learn anything quickly and thoroughly. She is a hardworking person and is an outstanding team player. I would recommend Deepali for any position that she seeks.
